name: Forsaken Fortress - the survival RPG
blurb: A special RPG in which you assemble your team, build and manage your base, collect resources, and survive in a post-apocalyptic world

rewards.reward: No Reward

Digital only $75\uff08(This pack is not included in any other tier\uff09\r\n2 DRM-free digital copies of the game for PC, Mac or Linux + exclusive kickstarter in-game item +free updates after the game is complete +1 digital hi-res map + 1 beta key\r\n+ the game soundtrack (MP3s) + digital high-resolution wallpapers + digital collector's book + screen saver + Special thanks in the credits

All previous rewards  + hard cover collector's book. The book includes the art from the world of Forsaken Fortress, its history, characters, story and more. + your name in the credits as "Bronze Backer"
Black Friday Special. Pledge here to get the $150 tier as our Black Friday gift for you : )

The Collector's Edition = All digital rewards  + boxed Forsaken Fortress DVD-ROM, soundtrack CD, manual, collectible bookmark, keychain tag, hard cover collector's book, a high-quality poster and a special signed thank you letter from the team. + your name in the credits as "Silver Backer"

Deluxe Collector Edition = All digital rewards +  boxed Forsaken Fortress DVD-ROM, soundtrack CD, game manual, collectible bookmark, special handmade photo frame,keychain tag, hard cover collector's book, two high-quality posters,character and monster card set, Captain's Diary notebook, Forsaken Fortress T-Shirt, special signed thank you letter from the team.  + one extra digital copies of the game + your name in the credits as "Gold Backer".

Memento Package =\r\nAll Deluxe Edition items + A personalized memento about you or loved one will be placed in the Forsaken Fortress world. For example, a diary in an abandoned hut. + your name in the credits as "Master Backer".
Miniature Package =\r\nMemento Package + Limited-Edition Character Miniature+ your name in the credits as "Elite Backer".

Personalized Package =\r\nMiniature Package + You will be made into a recruitable character in the game, you need provide us your portrait and you will determine this character's attributes. + your name in the credits as "Grand Backer". Free Shipping
Vehicle Package =\r\nMiniature Package + \r\nDesign one original vehicle for the game with us  + your name in the credit as "Associate Designer". Free shipping

Super Personalized Package=\r\nMiniature Package + You and another person will be made into two recruitable characters in the game. Imagine that you are fighting with someone you care + your name in the credit as "Historical Backer". Free shipping.

Town Designer Package=\r\nMiniature Package +\r\nHelp us create a town somewhere in the wasteland. Name it as you wish (within reason), and design the defining characteristics of the town. The town will be placed prominently in the game. + your name in the credit as "Associate Designer". Free shipping.

Producer Package = Any previous rewards + 10 extra copies of the game+
We want to thank you for you generosity in person! You and one friend are invited to the Forsaken Fortress headquarters to spend a whole day with the development team to discuss the future of the game, etc. Participate in all aspect of the game development, and be listed as a Producer in the credits! You will also be invited to attend the Forsaken Fortress launch party. 

Donor will be responsible for travel costs. Accommodation will be provided.
